actionConfiguration.body:
INSERT INTO course (
    name,
    description,
    duration,
    language,
	 	instrcutor,
    thumbnail_url,
    course_type_id,
    course_level_id,
    course_subject_id
) VALUES (
    {{inp_courseTitle.text}},
    {{inp_description.text}},
    {{inp_duration.text}},
    {{inp_language.text}},
	{{inp_instructor.text}},
    {{this.params.thumbnailUrl}},
    {{sel_type.selectedOptionValue}},
    {{sel_levels.selectedOptionValue}},
    {{sel_courseSubject.selectedOptionValue}}
);
